CHAT.comment: CIGNA CORPORATION, ET AL., Petitioners v. JANICE C. AMARA, ET AL., INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN R. BRUCE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:08 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
